name: AzureEventgrid
help: Manage Azure Event Grid topics, event subscriptions, domains and domain topics.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the domain.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the domain.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: OdataQuery
properties.help: The OData query used for filtering the list results. Filtering is currently allowed on the Name property only. The supported operations include: CONTAINS, eq (for equal), ne (for not equal), AND, OR and NOT.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the domain.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the domain.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.help: Endpoint where EventGrid should deliver events matching this event subscription. For webhook endpoint type, this should be the corresponding webhook URL. For other endpoint types, this should be the Azure resource identifier of the endpoint.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the event subscription.

properties.name: AdvancedFilter
properties.help: An advanced filter enables filtering of events based on a specific event property.

properties.name: DeadletterEndpoint
properties.help: The Azure resource ID of an Azure Storage blob container destination where EventGrid should deadletter undeliverable events for this event subscription.

properties.name: EndpointType
properties.help: The type of the destination endpoint.

properties.name: EventTtl
properties.help: Event time to live (in minutes). Must be a number between 1 and 1440.

properties.name: ExpirationDate
properties.help: Date or datetime (in UTC, e.g. '2018-11-30T11:59:59+00:00' or '2018-11-30') after which the event subscription would expire. By default, there is no expiration for the event subscription.

properties.name: IncludedEventTypes
properties.help: A space-separated list of event types (e.g., Microsoft.Storage.BlobCreated Microsoft.Storage.BlobDeleted). To subscribe to all default event types, do not specify this argument. For event grid topics, event types are customer defined. For Azure events, e.g., Storage Accounts, IoT Hub, etc., you can query their event types using this CLI command 'az eventgrid topic-type list-event-types'.

properties.name: Labels
properties.help: A space-separated list of labels to associate with this event subscription.

properties.name: MaxDeliveryAttempts
properties.help: Maximum number of delivery attempts. Must be a number between 1 and 30.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource.

properties.name: SourceResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource to which the event subscription needs to be created.

properties.name: SubjectBeginsWith
properties.help: An optional string to filter events for an event subscription based on a prefix. Wildcard characters are not supported.

properties.name: SubjectCaseSensitive
properties.help: Specify to indicate whether the subject fields should be compared in a case sensitive manner. True if flag present.

properties.name: SubjectEndsWith
properties.help: An optional string to filter events for an event subscription based on a suffix. Wildcard characters are not supported.

properties.name: TopicName
properties.help: Name of Event Grid topic.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the event subscription.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource.

properties.name: SourceResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource whose event subscription needs to be deleted.

properties.name: TopicName
properties.help: Name of Event Grid topic.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: OdataQuery
properties.help: The OData query used for filtering the list results. Filtering is currently allowed on the Name property only. The supported operations include: CONTAINS, eq (for equal), ne (for not equal), AND, OR and NOT.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource.

properties.name: SourceResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource whose event subscription needs to be listed.

properties.name: TopicName
properties.help: Name of Event Grid topic.

properties.name: TopicTypeName
properties.help: Name of the topic-type whose event subscriptions need to be listed. When this is specified, you must also specify --location.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the event subscription.

properties.name: IncludeFullEndpointUrl
properties.help: Specify to indicate whether the full endpoint URL should be returned. True if flag present.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource.

properties.name: SourceResourceId
properties.help: Fully qualified identifier of the Azure resource whose event subscription needs to be shown.

properties.name: TopicName
properties.help: Name of Event Grid topic.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the event subscription.

properties.name: DeadletterEndpoint
properties.help: The Azure resource ID of an Azure Storage blob container destination where EventGrid should deadletter undeliverable events for this event subscription.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.help: Endpoint where EventGrid should deliver events matching this event subscription. For webhook endpoint type, this should be the corresponding webhook URL. For other endpoint types, this should be the Azure resource identifier of the endpoint.

properties.name: EndpointType
properties.help: The type of the destination endpoint.

properties.name: IncludedEventTypes
properties.help: A space-separated list of event types (e.g., Microsoft.Storage.BlobCreated Microsoft.Storage.BlobDeleted). To subscribe to all default event types, do not specify this argument. For event grid topics, event types are customer defined. For Azure events, e.g., Storage Accounts, IoT Hub, etc., you can query their event types using this CLI command 'az eventgrid topic-type list-event-types'.

properties.name: SubjectEndsWith

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
